name: Cubethon (LucaTony)
description:
Welcome to Cubethon, a fun game about evading cubes as they get closer to you! It is simple! Just use the "a" and "d" keys to move left and right! This game is a continuation of a project by a popular Youtuber that goes by the name of Brackeys who started it as a tutorial series to help new developers (like me!) to get started with the Unity Engine.


Disclaimer: The game is early in development. If you find a bug with your version of the game, please report it in the discussion board for Cubethon
